articles.description: In one of the biggest upsets in UFC history, Sean Strickland toppled champion Israel Adesanya by unanimous decision to capture the middleweight title at UFC 293.
articles.content:
The greatest upset in UFC middleweight title fight history belongs to Sean Strickland.
Strickland (28-5) stunned the mixed martial arts world Saturday as he claimed the 185-pound championship in a f… [+4261 chars]

articles.description: No Lionel Messi, no worries. Inter Miami and Sporting Kansas City supplied a lot of action as Messi’s side take a 3-2 win without their superstar
articles.content:
The big question was whether Inter Miami

articles.title: Struggling with bat, Shanaka leads Sri Lanka to victory with ball - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Shanaka is no one's idea of a world-class bowler but he makes it work against Bangladesh with his 3 for 28
